function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through physical contact during the survey data collection process.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited air sampling volume and dilution of airborne sars-cov-2 in the room","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misconception about the novelty of contagious diseases in urban settings","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Insufficient disinfection and monitoring of swimming pool facilities","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper disposal of used disinfectants to avoid possible contact with humans","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sewage samples positive for sars-cov-2 rna","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of information involves interacting with building staff and users, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient air purification leading to high pm2.5 concentrations in various hospital areas","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of investigation into negative aspects of gated communities as pandemic protection solutions","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Photographs and narratives collected from various homes","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased frequency of garden usage may lead to higher contact and potential spread of contagious diseases in shared spaces.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of individuals with disease symptoms through video surveillance","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact on non-communicable diseases ncds due to decreased physical activity during lockdown","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of training and education on pandemic preparedness and infection control","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglecting the impact of low relative humidity on disease transmission","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 within construction sites","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Air recirculation","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate wastewater treatment","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Guidelines on social distancing","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of bioaerosol samplers in crowded public spaces to monitor respiratory viruses","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High residential density may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases within the neighborhood","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Highly infective disease with a range of symptoms, including respiratory education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission through tears","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Risk of infectious disease transmission to education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Missed reinfections","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of conventional wastewater treatment
